name: Game Traveller
description:
This game was made for the 32-bit game jam with myself and ForMathMe.

The game tries to mimic the PS1 style of graphics, with modern technology.

We didn't have the full 2 weeks to work on this project, but I hope you enjoy it.

Credits:

Programming - Me and ForMathMe

Texturing - ambientCG

Sound Effects - OpenGameArt.org
